tags: None
review:
Both the doctors, Dr Suchita & Dr Sanket are extremely humble, caring and experienced doctors. They answered all our questions and never rushed us through an explanation. Even their staff nurses were very caring and supportive.
 She made me and my husband very comfortable during the last stressful days. I really thank both of them for making my pregnancy experience wonderful. I strongly recommend them to any of my family and friends without any hesitation. She is truly an exceptional doctor and a human being. We are currently very happy parents to our twin girl and a boy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnant Women Counseling,Pregnancy Tests,Pregnancy Check Up,Cesarean Delivery,
review:
Had my baby delivered here. Absolutely brilliant experience right from the pretests up to delivery and right now with pediatrics.
Dr. Suchita Pisat & Dr. Sanket Pisat is an extremely professional and courteous Doctor I have come across. He gave us utmost attention on each follow up visit and was willing to listen to us and answer every query.
My Wife and I are truly grateful to him for the remarkable advice & care he gave during my pregnancy and for the smooth & safe delivery of our daughter.
Lovely Doctors that make every visit worthwhile and the staff, front desk, nurses and helpers are extremely courteous and friendly. Definitely recommend to anyone planning a child!!

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr. Suchita & Dr. Sanket Pisat are excellent doctors. She and her whole staff took great care of all my concerns during and after delivery. I will always be grateful to Dr. Sanket for his efforts he took so i could have the beautiful experience of delivering both my kids naturally. 
I want to thank both Dr. Suchita & Dr. Sanket from the bottom of hearts for helping deliver the most precious gifts of our life.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Consulted with Dr Suchita Pisat right from confirming my pregnancy to my delivery. Had a great experience. The doctor took time to explain dos and don'ts, medical issues and processes which eased my worries and enabled a smooth pregnancy and delivery. Her team followed up for scheduled check ups and were very helpful.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The doctor along with the support staff nurses were very helpful during the entire process. They knew their work and helped a first time mother like me to make sure I take care of my baby in these challenging times of Covid 19. Their follow ups are also commendable.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: I was suffering from endometriosis for many years and in spite of so many so many sonography checks it was not found out. I came to Dr Suchita after taking pain medicines for so many years, she suggested laproscopy surgery and removed small cysts and adhesion. It has been 8 months now and my pain is very very less after surgery and medicines. God bless!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Suchita is really kind, caring, *** **** **** ** ********** She properly explains and solves all the doubts a patient has. She  makes sure she is available for her patient.. in person or atleast on call. Her guidance really helped me go through my pregnancy easily. Her staff is equally kind and helpful.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
*** Personally had a great experience as we welcomed our baby. Right from  first month we were associated with the Aaknasha clinic  and then to hospital , what we found here  was happiness always. In fact  our regular checkup visits were what we were always looking forward to Staff here is very curteous and always ready to help.
Our stay for delivery and couple of day after that was really amazing. Nusring staff was very helpful. Dr. Suchita Pisat (our gynaecologist) special thanks to her - very supportive and positive in each and every stage of complete pregnancy. Highly recommended for all. Very good service by the hospital.
Thank you for the wonderful care taken by Aakansha metering hospital  and whole team....


#Sandesh / Shalaka Bovne

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: Extremely comforting and to the point. Hygienic clinic. Explained the problem in detail and was open to answer all my questions promptly

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: It just wasn’t the treatment, but the doctor's reassuring words which gave me the strength to pull through my condition. The doctor was always available at a call and the staff at their nursing home took great care. Most importantly the doctor answered all our multiple repetitive questions with calm and composure. I am grateful I got the confidence that I am in safe hands.
